# Testing IRC registration with CAP support

# Request 2 capabilities
READ CAP LS 302
READ NICK $nick
READ USER $ $ $ $
SEND CAP * LS :away-notify server-time
READ CAP REQ :away-notify server-time
SEND CAP * ACK :away-notify server-time
READ CAP END

SEND :src 001 $nick something :Welcome home
EVENTWAIT registered nick=$nick


# No supported capabilities to request
RESET
READ CAP LS 302
READ NICK $nick
READ USER $ $ $ $
SEND CAP * LS :example.com/ignoreme
READ CAP END

SEND :src 001 $nick something :Welcome home
EVENTWAIT registered nick=$nick
